title: [Old Ta'Faendryl, River Bank]
description: A thick cluster of oak to the east provides a shadowed canopy beside the river.  Moss and covers the ground beneath the trees like a soft green blanket.

A thick cluster of oak to the east provides a shady canopy beside the river.  The shade of the trees has starved the sun-loving bulrush, leaving the banks clear for the growth of moss and thickly leaved vines.
